lexUnit.name: convention.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: a settled or regular tendency or practice

sentence.text: The age-old operatic convention of characters resorting to song to articulate what mere speech fails to comprehend has become just one expressive element in a genre with roots in an increasing number of disciplines .
